title: Making Lace: Then and Now, an interview with Elena Kanagy-Loux, pt 1
itunes:title: Making Lace: Then and Now, an interview with Elena Kanagy-Loux, pt 1
description:
Lace maker and historian Elena Kanagy-Loux joins us this week to talk about the history of handmade lace and its makers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
